review_title: Enhance capacities of personnel and communities.
pros:
ICRC is a trusted organization and great place to work in.
Though it is rather slow in the sustainability phase of assisting communities, however, the continued development is one of the most prominent aspects of the ICRC. It strives to reduce error while increase accuracy of targeting beneficiaries.
cons:
Considering the context's hardship, the communications between the units of one delegation sometimes goes down in responding to the recommendations provided other unit.
The local field officers afford heavy tasks in a societies of needy people who do not care about the regular work hours.
In few cases the brave management only can change the orientation of project implementation depending on the pop up facts.
Comparing to other organizations, the ICRC pay less for the local staff.
Despite the hardship of tasks in the severe climate weathers and stiffness of beneficiaries but one cannot have anything but to love the work
